archimate:Driver.name: Efficiency
archimate:Driver.documentation: The "efficiency" driver is a key influencer in organizational and technological strategies, focusing on optimizing processes, resource utilization, and overall operational effectiveness. It encourages the pursuit of methods and technologies that enhance productivity, reduce waste, and streamline workflows. This driver is fundamental in shaping decisions that aim to maximize outputs with minimal inputs, often leading to innovations in process management and technology adoption. It has a significant impact on how an organization approaches problem-solving, resource management, and continuous improvement initiatives.
